parameters.name: CollectionData
parameters.description: The data that you want to delete.

parameters.name: CollectionDataFilter
parameters.description: The filter conditions for the data to be deleted.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The name of the namespace. Default value: public.

>  You can call the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace that consists of multiple AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. You must specify one of the WorkspaceId and DBInstanceId parameters. If you specify both parameters, the WorkspaceId parameter takes effect.
